examples.example: 我每天都开开心心地去上学，享受知识带来的乐趣。

translate.english: I go to school happily every day and enjoy the pleasure brought by knowledge.

examples.example: 我每天都怀着期待去上学，努力追求自己的梦想。

translate.english: I go to school with anticipation every day and strive to pursue my own dream.

examples.example: 我总是兴高采烈地去上学，和同学们一起度过快乐的时光。

translate.english: I always go to school cheerfully and spend happy time with my classmates.
